remarks: In an ordered monoid, the ordering is compatible with group addition. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)
statement:
omndadd.0 $e |- B = ( Base ` M ) $.
omndadd.1 $e |- .<_ = ( le ` M ) $.
omndadd.2 $e |- .+ = ( +g ` M ) $.
omndadd $p |- ( ( M e. oMnd /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ X .<_ Y ) -> ( X .+ Z ) .<_ ( Y .+ Z ) ) $.
